description:
net/http: don't allow zero byte in FileServer paths

Should probably be fixed in the syscall package, either
additional or instead of this CL.

Fixes issue 3842

messages.text:
LGTM

Weren't you the one who added strings.Contains?
Also the () are unnecessary.

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

On Sun, Jul 29, 2012 at 8:47 PM, Russ Cox <rsc@golang.org> wrote:

> LGTM
>
> Weren't you the one who added strings.Contains?
>

Yeah, whoops.  I was too closely following the code above.

Also the () are unnecessary.
>

Will remove.

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=2307a931664e ***

net/http: don't allow zero byte in FileServer paths

Should probably be fixed in the syscall package, either
additional or instead of this CL.

Fixes issue 3842

R=golang-dev, rsc
CC=golang-dev
